content: I'd like to run lake exe shake on a project downstream of mathlib. Is this supported? Is lake exe shake the right invocation?

I tried this (adding an import that was clearly superfluous), that didn't work.
But lake exe shake ProjectName does, as is indicated in the --help output.
In other words: I should read the help output first :face_palm: Thanks for making the output informative!
Michael Rothgang has marked this topic as resolved.
